page_intro: How Faces Reveal the Language of Emotion through Expression, Truth, and Empathy within the Art of Human Perception.

articles.title: The Language of the Face
articles.subtitle: How expression becomes the mirror of emotion.
articles.main_paragraph_bold: Every movement of the face carries emotional meaning.
articles.paragraph_1: This article explores how facial muscles reveal hidden emotional states. From joy to fear, expressions form a universal language of feeling.
articles.paragraph_2: Understanding this language improves empathy and connection, showing how perception deepens emotional intelligence.

articles.title: Truth and Deception in Expression
articles.subtitle: Recognising sincerity and emotional leakage.
articles.main_paragraph_bold: Even the smallest movement can reveal the truth of emotion.
articles.paragraph_1: This article examines how microexpressions uncover suppressed feelings and emotional leakage. It teaches awareness beyond spoken language.
articles.paragraph_2: By learning these cues, we become better observers of authenticity, understanding both honesty and hidden emotion.

articles.title: Empathy Through Observation
articles.subtitle: How seeing emotion creates emotional understanding.
articles.paragraph_1: This article shows how attentive observation of faces builds emotional resonance. By seeing others clearly, we understand ourselves more deeply.
articles.paragraph_2: It connects the science of facial analysis with the art of compassion, uniting empathy with awareness.
